title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When connecting a Derby database, the column icons do not appear.
EB: When there is no data for the series, the software should display a friendly error message to remind the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to the Derby database:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.
6.
